: ** ğŸ™ï¸ As you are walking through a town through narrow alleys, you enter what seems to be a small shop where a group of men are quietly chatting.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ‘¥ Vous discutez un moment avec ces sympathiques marchands qui dÃ©cident de commercer avec vous !
translations.en: ** | ğŸ‘¥ You chat for a moment with these friendly merchants who decided to trade with you!

translations.en: ** | ğŸ‘¥ Unfortunately for you, the group of merchants has nothing to sell, so you go on your way.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ‘¥ Moins accueillant que vous ne l'espÃ©riez, le groupe d'hommes vous encercle rapidement et sous menace de coups, vous soulage de quelques sous avant de prendre la fuite !
translations.en: ** | ğŸ‘¥ Less welcoming than you expected, the group of men quickly surrounds you and, through treats, relieves you of a few coins before running away!

La magnifique Ã©pÃ©e sertie de diamants que l'on vous a promis semble plutÃ´t faite de mousse molle. Vous revenez rapidement sur vos pas mais la porte de l'Ã©choppe semble dÃ©finitivement fermÃ©e ! translations.en: ** | ğŸ‘¥ You should have trusted your intuition and refused this "good deal"... The beautiful diamond sword you were promised looks more like a soft foam sword. You quickly retrace your steps but the door to the shop seems definitively closed! Swearing never to be duped again, you go back on your way.

translations.en: ** | ğŸ’° Unfortunately, there's nothing to steal. However, your attempt did not go unnoticed! Shame on you, you give the owners back their coin and head back to the main road.

translations.en: ** | ğŸ’° Caught red-handed! Faced with five men of imposing stature, you bitterly regret your unfortunate act. You leave, feeling groggy after paying compensation. ğŸ˜–
